field.name: summary
field.value: reference by ID depends on order in XML file if service attribute is not defined

field.name: description
field.value:
Windsor RC3 fails to initialise components from this config file:
<configuration> <components> <component id="mike" type="HelloWorld.Caller,Windsor-HelloWorld"> <parameters> <name>Mike</name> <friend>${tom}</friend> </parameters> </component>
<component id="tom" type="HelloWorld.AutoResponder,Windsor-HelloWorld"> <parameters> <name>Tom</name> <message>Hi there!</message> </parameters> </component>
</components> </configuration>
the error message is
Can't create component 'mike' as it has dependencies to be satisfied. mike is waiting for the following dependencies:
Services: - HelloWorld.IChatClient which was not registered.
when the order of components is inverted, loading works correctly.
